overview: Blásida, 80 years old, travels accompanied by her grandson Felipe, 11 years old, looking for the remains of her husband who disappeared during the military dictatorship of Alfredo Stroessner, hires Pablino, a farmer who claims to know the place where he was buried; he guides them to "Kurusu Rebelde" (the cross of the rebel), he must leave when he receives sad news, Blásida and Felipe will have to continue the search alone.
title: Kurusu Rebelde
